derivation: also (plural) פּוּרִים; or פֻּרִים; from H6331 (פּוּר);
outline:
Pur or Purim = "lot" or "piece"
  1. lot
    1. a special feast among the post-exilic Jews, to celebrate their deliverance from Haman's destruction through queen Esther's heroic actions
strongs_def: a lot (as by means of a broken piece)
